physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Alert and oriented. Miniâ€“Mental State Examination score 28/30 (2 errors recalling 3 objects at 5 minutes). Mild expressive aphasia; dysarthric speech. Visual acuity and fields normal; pupils symmetric and reactive to light; no afferent pupillary defect. Mild right central facial weakness. Muscle bulk normal. Strength 4/5 in right deltoid, wrist extensors, and wrist flexors; 4+/5 in biceps and triceps. Right leg spastic; strength 4+/5 in iliopsoas, normal in quadriceps, hamstring, and gastrocnemius. Left arm and leg normal power; increased tone in left arm, normal in left leg. Reflexes 3+/5 in both arms and legs. Extensor plantar responses on right side, flexor on left side. Gait hemiparetic. Coordination normal in left arm and both legs; right arm not assessed due to paralysis.
